channel.title: SAA 2018 Government Digital Data - Rosemarie Blewitt

item.title: Managing Digital Data at the North Carolina Office of State Archaeology: Challenges and Directions
item.description:
Rosemarie Blewitt

The North Carolina Office of State Archaeology (OSA) was created by the North Carolina General Assembly in 1973 to coordinate and implement a statewide archaeological preservation program. This program includes prehistoric, historic, and underwater archaeology, and is implemented by staff in five offices throughout the state. Central to â€¦
